column1: Qianzhou (Chinese: 乾州街道; pinyin: Qiánzhōu Jiēdào) is a subdistrict and the seat of Jishou City in Hunan
column2: China. The subdistrict is located in the south of the city
column3: it is bordered by Fenghuang County to the west and southwest
column4: Luxi County to the southeast and east
column6: Zhenxi and Majing'ao subdistricts to the north. It has an area of 203.74 km2 (78.66 sq mi) with a population of 65 thousand (2015 end).
